title: Hexblade
content:
act with an entity from the Shadowfell. Hexblade Warlocks can curse enemies and control them, raise the spirits from a corpse of enemies such as constructs or giant blobs, and even summon an entity that can deal necrotic damage. The Primary Ability of the Warlock class is Charisma, their saving throw proficiencies are Wisdom & Charisma and they have a Hit Dice of 1d8. They have proficiency with Simple weapons and Light Armour.

You have made your pact with a mysterious entity from the Shadowfell
